snippet: The American Contract Bridge League’s Hall of Fame banquet will take place on Sunday evening, when four players will be recognized.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played by Jan Martel at the 1986 Fall North American Championships in Atlanta.
lead_paragraph: The American Contract Bridge League’s Hall of Fame banquet will take place on Sunday evening, when four players will be recognized.

headline.seo: Bridge - Jan Martel, Blackwood Award Winner
